00035 KHLaMCEvent::KHLaMCEvent(const KHLaMCEvent &anEvent)
00036         : KEvent(anEvent)

00044 KHLaMCEvent& KHLaMCEvent::operator=(const KEvent &anEvent)
00045 {
00046 #ifdef _K_DEBUG_EVENT_ASSIGNOP
00047         cout << "HLaMC = base" << endl;
00048 #endif
00049         if(&anEvent == this) return *this;
00050 
00051         //copy the base class info.
00052         this->KEvent::operator=(anEvent);
00053         
00054         return *this;
00055 }
00056 
00057 KHLaMCEvent& KHLaMCEvent::operator=(const KHLaMCEvent &anEvent)
00058 {
00059 #ifdef _K_DEBUG_EVENT_ASSIGNOP
00060         cout << "HLaMC = HLaMC" << endl;
00061 #endif
00062         if(&anEvent == this) return *this;
00063 
00064         //copy the base class info.
00065         this->KHLaMCEvent::operator=(anEvent);
00066 
00067         CopyLocalMembers(anEvent);
00068         CopyClonesArrays(anEvent);
00069         return *this;   
00070 }

00072 void KHLaMCEvent::CopyLocalMembers(const KHLaMCEvent &anEvent)

00078 KHLaMCEvent::~KHLaMCEvent(void) 
00079 {
00080         //Does calling Clear at destructor take up too much computing time?
00081         Clear("C");
00082         
00083         if(fBolo) delete fBolo;
00084         fBolo = 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void KHLaMCEvent::Clear(Option_t *opt)
00088 {
00089         ClearArray(opt, fBolo,fNumBolo);
00090         //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00091         //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00092         //in the case that instances of this object are stored
00093         //inside of a TClonesArray
00094         KEvent::Clear(opt);
00095         
00096         //Clear and delete local objects here. 
00097         InitializeMembers();
00098 }

00105 Bool_t KHLaMCEvent::IsSame(const KHLaMCEvent &anEvent, Bool_t bPrint) const
00106 {
00107         //Compares two KHLaMCEvent and their member variables to test for equality.
00108         //If bPrint is set to true, then a message for each member variable that is different
00109         //will print to standard out. Otherwise, this method will return false and quit
00110         //checking member variables as soon as it finds a unequal data member.
00111         
00112         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00113         
00114         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00115         if(!this->KHLaMCEvent::IsSame(anEvent,bPrint)){
00116                 if (bPrint) 
00117                         bIsEqual = false;
00118                 if(!bPrint)
00119                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00120                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00121         }
00122         
00123         if(fNumBolo == anEvent.fNumBolo){
00124                 for(Int_t i = 0; i < fNumBolo; i++){
00125                         KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *s = GetBolo(i);
00126                         KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *sOther = anEvent.GetBolo(i);
00127                         if(s != 0 && sOther != 0){
00128                                 if(!s->IsSame(*sOther, bPrint)){
00129                                         if (bPrint) 
00130                                                 cout << "KHLaMCEvent KMCSingleBoloSubRecord number " << i << " Not Equal" << endl;              
00131                                         bIsEqual = false;
00132                                         if(!bPrint)
00133                                                 return false;
00134                                 }
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         else {
00139                 if (bPrint) 
00140                         cout << "KHLaMCEvent fNumBolo Not Equal" << endl;               
00141                 bIsEqual = false;
00142                 if(!bPrint)
00143                         return false;
00144         }
00145         
00146         
00147         return bIsEqual;
00148 }
00149 
00150 KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *KHLaMCEvent::GetBolo(Int_t i) const
00151 {
00152   // Return the i'th Bolometer Sub Record for this event.
00153         KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *ms = 0;
00154         if (i < fNumBolo) ms = (KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *)fBolo->At(i);
00155         return ms;
00156 }
00157 
00158 KMCSingleBoloSubRecord* KHLaMCEvent::AddBolo(void)
00159 {
00160         AddTriggerType(kBoloTriggerType);
00161         return AddSubRecord<KMCSingleBoloSubRecord>(fBolo,fNumBolo);
00162 }

00164 void KHLaMCEvent::ClearArray(Option_t *anOption, TClonesArray *mArray, Int_t &mCount)
00165 {
00166         if(mArray) {
00167                 mArray->Clear( (anOption && *anOption) ? anOption : "C" );
00168                 //we have to delete because our sub-records contain TString members! :(
00169                 //mArray->Delete( (anOption && *anOption) ? anOption : "C" );
00170                 mCount = 0;
00171         }
00172 }
00173 
00174 template<class T> T* KHLaMCEvent::AddSubRecord(TClonesArray *mArray, Int_t &mCount)
00175 {
00176         TClonesArray &mArrayRef = *mArray;
00177         T* mNewSubRecord = new(mArrayRef[mCount++]) T;
00178         return mNewSubRecord;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void KHLaMCEvent::CopyClonesArrays(const KHLaMCEvent &anEvent)
00182 {
00183         //ClonesArray assignment doesn't appear to work in the following way
00184         //*fSamba = *anEvent.GetSambaSubRecords();
00185         //*fBolo = *anEvent.GetBoloSubRecords();
00186         //*fBoloPulse = *anEvent.GetBoloPulseSubRecords();
00187         //*fMuonModule = *anEvent.GetMuonModuleSubRecords();
00188         
00189         //so, I just clear this object's array, and create as many objects as I need.
00190         //this might be inefficient, but I don't think so. besides,
00191         //we likely won't be creating many many instances of the Event class.
00192         //at least, we shouldn't do that. 
00193         //if your code is really slow and you think it has something
00194         //to do with copying HLAEvents, look here for possible fixes. 
00195         
00196         ClearArray("C", fBolo,fNumBolo);
00197         
00198         
00199         for(Int_t i = 0; i < anEvent.GetNumBolos(); i++){
00200                 KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *s = AddBolo();
00201                 KMCSingleBoloSubRecord *sO = anEvent.GetBolo(i);
00202                 if(s != 0 && sO != 0) 
00203                         *s = *sO;
00204                 else
00205                         cout << "KHLaMCEvent::operator= Invalid SingleBolo Pointer" << endl;
00206         }
00207         
00208 }
00209 
00210 void KHLaMCEvent::CreateArrays(void)
00211 {
00212         if(!fBolo)
00213                 fBolo = new TClonesArray("KMCSingleBoloSubRecord",2);
00214         
00215 }
